department: MINISTÈRE SECRETAIRE DU CADRE DE LA DÉFENSE
description: Démonter l'amiante à la Base des Forces canadiennes Gagetown
tags: Canada-EU Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
full_summary:
### Asbestos Abatement Tender Announcement
#### Reference Number: WS3926952240
#### Date: 2023-03-21
#### Tender Closes: 2023-04-06 14:00:00

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified contractors to submit a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for asbestos abatement services. This invitation is for the supply of all necessary labour, materials, and equipment to remove Type 2 and Type 3 asbestos from buildings located within the CFB Gagetown Tunnel Systems, Training Area, and various sites.

**Contract Requirements:**

* Asbestos removal from identified buildings within 5 CDSB Gagetown Tunnel Systems, Training Area, and various sites.
* Work to be performed in accordance with the Specification Number L-G2-990/1904 ( част included in the tender package).
* Standing offer is an agreement, not a contract. No guarantee that the full or partial amount of the standing offer will be called upon.

**Tender Details:**

* Tender Reference Number: WS3926952240
* Tender Publication Date: 2023-03-21
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-06 14:00:00 (UTC-03:00)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-04-21
* Tender Status: Expired

**Contracting Entity:**

The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), with the end-user being the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Notice:**

The tender package and related documents are available on Ariba Discovery (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15752795?extsite=MTU3NTI3OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Eligibility:**

Please note that this tender is open to qualified contractors who meet the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (
